body: This should be `const std::vector<std::tuple<Tensor, bool>>&` or `at::ArrayRef<std::tuple<Tensor, bool>>`, right now you're making a copy each time.
body_html: This should be const std::vector<std::tuple<Tensor, bool>>& or at::ArrayRef<std::tuple<Tensor, bool>>, right now you're making a copy each time.
body_text: This should be const std::vector<std::tuple<Tensor, bool>>& or at::ArrayRef<std::tuple<Tensor, bool>>, right now you're making a copy each time.
